name: Ultrawings
detailed_description:
Ultrawings is the first aerial-themed, open-world game where you'll pilot multiple aircraft to complete a variety of missions across an island-themed world.

The game features full support for gamepad, HOTAS, rudder pedals, and both HTC Vive Wands and Oculus Touch allowing you to use your hands to virtually interact with each aircraft's flight instruments for a truly unparalleled flight experience!

Key Features

- Pilot 4 distinct aircraft using your virtual hands for an unparalleled flight experience!

- Soar around 4 unique, beautifully stylized islands!

- Earn money to buy new airports and new vehicles! Ultrawings is a VR game with progression!

- Lots of gameplay variety! Pop balloons, snap photos, race, perform spot landings, fly through score rings, and more! Ultrawings is the ultimate hobbyist flight game!

- The world feels alive! Soar by flocks of seagulls, buzz other planes, and even fly by boats and cars!

- Full English voice-overs guide you through the game!


User Review Quotes:

"It's fun in a way no flight sim has been in a long time!"

"The flight model is a perfect combination of arcade and just enough realism to make it challenging."

"Finally a sim that lets you hold the stick and operate the controls by hand."

"It brings back memories of pilot wings 64."

short_description: Ultrawings is an aerial-themed, open-world flight game where you use your virtual hands to fly multiple aircraft to complete a variety of missions across a beautiful, island-themed world!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Portuguese-Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“While there are several VR games out there that allow you to fly, none have quite hit that perfect balance between arcade and simulation in the way that Ultrawings has.”
90 – PS4 Experts

“Words can hardly describe my love and enjoyment of this game.”
100 – Game Chronicles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: Intel-i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
